select t.id, t.order_id, t.carton_no, t.fab_no, t.asn_length, t.asn_width, t.asn_height, t.asn_weight, t.asn_volume, t.asn_weigh_date, t.wms_length, t.wms_height, t.wms_width, t.wms_weight, t.wms_volume, t.wms_weigh_date, t.confirm_length, t.confirm_height, t.confirm_width, t.confirm_weight, t.confirm_volume, t.confirm_weigh_date, t.`status`, t.remark, t1.order_no, t1.customer_id, t2.name_cn, t2.company from order_case t LEFT JOIN order_info t1 on t1.id = t.order_id LEFT JOIN customer t2 on t2.id = t1.customer_id WHERE 1 = 1 /*箱号*/
AND t.`carton_no` LIKE concat('%',#{form.cartonNo},'%')
GROUP BY t.`id`

select t.id,t.order_id,t.carton_no,t.fab_no, t.asn_length,t.asn_width,t.asn_height,t.asn_weight,t.asn_volume,t.asn_weigh_date, t.wms_length,t.wms_height,t.wms_width,t.wms_weight,t.wms_volume,t.wms_weigh_date, t.confirm_length,t.confirm_height,t.confirm_width,t.confirm_weight,t.confirm_volume,t.confirm_weigh_date, t.`status`,t.remark, CONCAT(t.asn_length,'*',t.asn_width,'*',t.asn_height) asn_lwg from order_case t where t.order_id = #{orderId}

select distinct t.id,t.carton_no,t.confirm_volume, t1.ocean_counter_id, t2.cntr_no, t3.order_id oceanBillNo,t3.sail_time,t3.voyage_day,t3.unit, (case t3.unit when '1' then DATE_ADD(t3.sail_time, INTERVAL t3.voyage_day HOUR) when '2' then DATE_ADD(t3.sail_time, INTERVAL t3.voyage_day DAY) when '3' then DATE_ADD(t3.sail_time, INTERVAL t3.voyage_day MONTH) else null end) as expectedReach, t5.order_no orderConfNo from order_case t left join counter_case t1 on t1.order_case_id = t.id left join ocean_counter t2 on t2.id = t1.ocean_counter_id left join ocean_bill t3 on t3.id = t2.ob_id left join (select * from ocean_conf_detail where types = 2) t4 on t4.id_code = t3.id left join order_conf t5 on t5.id = t4.order_id where t.order_id = #{orderId}

select t.id,t.order_id,t.carton_no,t.fab_no, t.asn_length,t.asn_width,t.asn_height,t.asn_weight,t.asn_volume,t.asn_weigh_date, t.wms_length,t.wms_height,t.wms_width,t.wms_weight,t.wms_volume,t.wms_weigh_date, t.confirm_length,t.confirm_height,t.confirm_width,t.confirm_weight,t.confirm_volume,t.confirm_weigh_date, t.`status`,t.remark, CONCAT(t.asn_length,'*',t.asn_width,'*',t.asn_height) asn_lwg from order_case t where t.carton_no = #{cartonNo}
